DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study increase regular physical activity among student foster self-management competency . The intervention implement paper-pencil intervention . The aim research project evaluate motivational volitional intervention comparison control intervention . Study participant recruit lecture Freie Universitaet Berlin follow twice ( two ten week baseline ) . The motivational intervention expect increase unmotivated participant ' intention physically active . The volitional intervention expect promote physical activity among motivated inactive participant . Both intervention hypothesize improve self-management competency time .
DOC.detailed_description: An experimental study plan time period ten week . In physical activity study , participant randomly allocate either one two intervention group ( IG ) active control group ( ACG ) , receive quiz physical activity sport . Intervention group 1 receive paper-pencil intervention focus positive outcome expectancy ( motivational intervention ) . Intervention group 2 receive paper-pencil intervention promotes formulation action plan physical activity ( volitional intervention ) . Furthermore , participant receive two email intervention booster end study . Study participant invite take part study lecture Freie Universitaet Berlin . The student follow twice : two week T1 ( paper-pencil ) , T2 take place ( paper-pencil ) . Eight week T2 T3 assessment conduct online . The hypothesis : Participants motivational intervention report large increase motivation adopt physical activity T1 T2 T3 , compare participant volitional control intervention . Effects large unmotivated participant already motivate participant . Participants volitional intervention report large increase physical activity T1 T2 T3 , compare participant motivational control intervention . Effects large motivate participant unmotivated participant .
DOC.criteria: capable exercise minimum level able fill questionnaire ( illiteracy ) adequate German language ability internet access email address
